ISSUE.TITLE: Typo in README: "insructions" â†’ "instructions"
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Thanks for reaching out!** We use this Issue tracker for issues with the Vercel CLI and related open source libraries. If you are experiencing an issue with the Vercel CLI please delete this text and describe your issue. _For general platform help and feedback please open a new discussion at https://vercel.community._ Hey team , I noticed a small typo in the README of this repo: > "Follow the insructions here https://vercel.com/docs/rest-api#creating-an-access-token" The word **"insructions"** should be corrected to **"instructions"**. Thanks for maintaining this awesome repo!
